properties.description: Aggregate daily query status per endpoint.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
DISTINCT 
a.filepath(1) as [filename]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/*.*.parquet',FORMAT = 'PARQUET')
as [a]
WHERE    
datediff(day,cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime), '2020-06-26') = 0

sqlReaderQuery.value:
with all_distributed_queries as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
    [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	[SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId],
	[distributed_statement_id_DT_String] as [DistributedStatementId]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
     'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/@{item().filename}.*.parquet',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	distributed_statement_id_DT_String varchar(50),
	eventName_DT_String varchar(200)
)
	AS [b]
WHERE [AppTypeName_DT_String] like 'Worker.VDW.%' and [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_distributed_computation_rpc' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%'
),
all_queries as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
    [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	[SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId],
	[status_DT_String] AS [QueryStatus],
	CAST([originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] as date) as [currentDay],
	[distributed_statement_id_DT_String] as [DistributedStatementId]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
     'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/@{item().filename}.*.parquet',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	distributed_statement_id_DT_String varchar(50),
	eventName_DT_String varchar(200),
	[status_DT_String] varchar(30),
	[originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] datetime2
)
AS [a]
WHERE [AppTypeName_DT_String] like 'Worker.VDW.%' and [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_statement_execution' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%' and [status_DT_String] <> 'Started'
),
joined_data as 
(
select all_queries.* from all_queries 
inner join all_distributed_queries on all_queries.Region = all_distributed_queries.Region and all_queries.SubscriptionId = all_distributed_queries.SubscriptionId and all_queries.Endpoint = all_distributed_queries.Endpoint and all_queries.DistributedStatementId = all_distributed_queries.DistributedStatementId
)
select 
	Region,SubscriptionId,Endpoint,currentDay,
	count(distinct DistributedStatementId) as numOfQueries,
	sum(case when QueryStatus = 'Succeeded' then 1 else 0 end) as numOfQueries_succeeded,
	sum(case when QueryStatus = 'Failed' then 1 else 0 end) as numOfQueries_failed,
	sum(case when QueryStatus = 'Canceled' then 1 else 0 end) as numOfQueries_canceled
from joined_data
group by Region,SubscriptionId,Endpoint,currentDay
